title: My profile
respond_desc: Do you wish to join the band named as
delete_warning: Make sure to check whether you are the owner of any band. If you are the owner, transfer ownership to another member because, otherwise, the band and the songs saved in it will be removed, and third parties may end up using the public songs of your band in their performances.
